title: God of War Ragnarök: New Gameplay Revealed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.02.22
description:
Tim and Blessing talk about the new God of War Ragnarok gameplay, a big Cyberpunk 2077 stream incoming, Prey's director not loving the game's name, and The Quarry director teasing their next game.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping

We’re going back to Twitch next week!

We’re off next Monday for Labor day!

Rocky Balboa in Review is up right now over on Youtube.com/KindaFunny!

The Roper Report  -

00:07:36 - God of War Ragnarök gameplay footage shows off new weapon abilities
00:22:12 - CD Projekt is revealing what’s next for Cyberpunk 2077 next week
00:29:56 - Ad
00:32:07 - Prey’s Director Thought Using That Name Was A 'Mistake'
00:40:20 - The Quarry director says his next game will be ‘just as big’ and could deviate from teen horror
00:45:40 - Xbox Game Pass Friends and Family Plan has been officially confirmed
00:49:42 - Skyrim Anniversary Edition has been rated for Switch
00:51:39 - Splitgate is ending future development
00:56:05 - Out today
00:58:23 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Mon: We’re Off
Tues: Greg and Blessing
Wed: Greg and Jeff Gertsmann
Thurs: Greg and Tim
Fri: Tim and Greg
